text: Madison Lilly Bailey (born January 29, 1999) is an American actress. She is known for her starring role as Kiara Carrera on the Netflix drama series Outer Banks. "Netflix - Outer Banks""Madison Bailey IMDb" ==Early life== Bailey was born and raised in Kernersville, North Carolina, and is the youngest of 7 siblings.Clodfelter, Tim. "North Carolina native stars in Netflix show ‘Outer Banks’", The Charlotte Observer, May 11, 2020 ==Personal life== She has been diagnosed with borderline personality disorder. She’s also pansexual and is dating University of North Carolina Charlotte Women’s Basketball star, Mariah Linney. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Year ! Title !
